script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Our next act is a real romantic at heart, joining us from Milan, Italy, please welcome Andrea! Andrea is a lifelong musician with a soft spot for a certain Green Day frontman. Tonight, he's taking on the iconic 'Good Riddance (Time of Your Life),' but with a twist. He's dedicating it to someone special on the panel. Let's see if his feelings translate through the music!

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Well, Andrea, that was... a choice. You know, I've heard that song butchered a thousand ways, but never quite like that.  Gotta give you credit for the guts, though!

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Haha, yeah, bold move, man!  But hey, I'm all for shooting your shot.  Sara, you got a date with this guy or what?

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: The sentiment was sweet, Andrea.  And you know, there's a rawness to your voice that I kind of liked.  It's honest, you know?

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Oh my gosh, you guys are killing me! Andrea, thank you for the dedication, it was very flattering.  I admire your bravery, that's for sure.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Well, Andrea, mixed reviews so far!  But this is Google's Got Talent, and anything can happen.  Time for the judges to weigh in.  Billie Joe, let's start with you.

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Look, man, I appreciate the love for the song, I really do.  But it's gonna be a no from me.  Stick to your own stuff, you know?

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: I gotta agree with Billie on this one.  It wasn't the best vocal performance I've ever heard.  But hey, you never know, maybe you'll serenade your way into Sara's heart another time.  A no from me, buddy.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: I'm torn!  I admire your passion, Andrea, and I always root for love.  But ultimately, this is about talent, and I'm not sure it's quite there yet.  It's a no from me.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you seem like a genuinely lovely guy, and I wish you all the best.  But I have to agree with the others, it's a no for me.  Keep practicing, though!

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: So, Andrea, it's a no from all four judges.  Your journey on Google's Got Talent ends here, but your love life might just be getting started!  Who knows what the future holds?  Thank you for sharing your heart with us, Andrea!
